description.value:
Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 22, Adventurer's Armory pg. 2, Ultimate Combat pg. 130

[PFS] Statistics

Cost 2 gp Weight 3 lbs.

Category Ammunition; Proficiency Ammunition

Description

These arrows come with specially designed grooves and fletching that cause them to emit a loud keening sound audible within 500 feet of their flight path.

They are sold in quantities of 20.
